title: Ripple teams up with TradFi giant SBI to distribute RLUSD stablecoin in Japan
summary: Ripple and SBI's partnership could enhance stablecoin adoption in Japan, fostering financial innovation and bridging traditional and digital finance. The post Ripple teams up with TradFi giant SBI to distribute RLUSD stablecoin in Japan appeared first on Crypto Briefing .

title: US CFTC Announces Next Phase of ‘Crypto Sprint,’ Seeks Public Feedback on Trading Rules
summary: The US CFTC has launched its next 'Crypto Sprint,' a four-phased series of rulemaking agenda, this time focused on stakeholder engagement. The post US CFTC Announces Next Phase of ‘Crypto Sprint,’ Seeks Public Feedback on Trading Rules appeared first on Cryptonews .
